name: left
description: Returns the leftmost count characters in a string.

examples.title: Using left() on a string
examples.description: In this example we'll use left() to return part of a string.
examples.code: writeOutput( left( 'The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog', 19 ) );

examples.title: Using left() in a function
examples.description: In this example we'll use left() in a function to help us to capitalize the first letter in a string.

examples.title: Using left() to test values
examples.description: In this example we'll use left() to test the first five characters of a request context variable.

examples.title: Using left() as a member function
examples.description: CF11+ Lucee4.5+ In this example we'll use left() as a member function inside a function to help us to capitalize the first letter in a string.
